content: Steve Levitt, the Freakonomics guy, or at least one of the two guys that wrote the Freakonomics books, has podcast called People I (Mostly) Admire, which I enjoy listening to every once in a while. The latest episode was a re-broadcast of his interview with John Green, who, prior to this interview, I didn’t really know anything about. I looked him up and realized he’s the brother of Hank Green, who I sort of knew from YouTube. So anyway, yeah, somehow I missed John Green, which feels weird for a very online person. I guess I need to read his books with my kids.
